biotools.summary: association analysis of CNVs with gene expression and quantitative phenotypes | Summarization and expression/phenotype association of CNV ranges | The CNVRanger package implements a comprehensive tool suite for CNV analysis. This includes functionality for summarizing individual CNV calls across a population, assessing overlap with functional genomic regions, and association analysis with gene expression and quantitative phenotypes
